document_data.name: Valantajar
document_data.mainbody: '''Valantajar''' was a [[rakshasa]] who worked as a private investigator in [[Waterdeep]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: By the {{YearlinkName|1492}},{{Waterdeep-time}} Valantajar went by the name '''Vincent Trench''' and managed the [[Tiger's Eye]], a detective business on [[Trollskull Alley]] in the [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]]. He could discover any secret in the city in exchange for [[gold]] or a service to him.
document_data.Personality: Valantajar had lived for many years in Waterdeep, changing identities as necessary. He had grown accustomed to living among mortals and—to his own astonishment—was rather fond of the city and its inhabitants.
